original_text: The king of Moab realized that he was not winning the battle. So he took 700 of his soldiers who had swords. They tried to attack their enemies and reach the king of Edom. But they failed to do that.
korean_text: 모압 왕이 전세가 극렬하여 당하기 어려움을 보고 칼찬 군사 칠백 명을 거느리고 돌파하여 지나서 에돔 왕에게로 가고자 하되 가지 못하고

sentences.original_text: that he was not winning the battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 전투에서 이기고 있지 않다는 것을

sentences.original_text: So he took 700 of his soldiers
They tried to attack their enemies
and reach the king of Edom
But they failed to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 그것을 하는 데 실패했습니다
